title: Get started - Davidnet Design System
description: Explains how to integrate Davidnet's Design System. In your sveltekit project.
body: Get started Prerequisites Installation Step 1 Step 2 Step 3 Add the NPM package. Include the root styling in your app.html. Include core components in your +layout.svelte. You are now ready to start using Davidnet Design System.
